title: Personal Website with React + vite + Tailwind
author: Zhenhao Yang
description: My First Step to the React

content.text: This website is designed to showcase my professional skills, projects, and provide a platform for sharing thoughts and insights via a blog.

items: Welcome Section: Brief introduction about me (profile photo, tagline, and a short bio).
Highlights: Key skills, career achievements, and an invitation to explore my projects and blog.
Purpose: Showcase my projects with detailed demonstrations of my skills in Mathematics, Statistics, and programming.
Project Gallery: Grid or list view of projects with thumbnail images.
Blog: Share personal insights, tutorials, or academic findings.
Blog List Page: Titles and excerpts for all blog posts.
Individual Blog Pages: Title, publication date, and author.
Content-rich with support for images, math formulas, and code blocks.
Responsive Design: Mobile and desktop friendly.
